description: Systemic Behavioral Constraints Manifest (SBCM) defines immutable or cryptographically fixed parameters governing the AGI's internal architecture, adaptation rate limits, and fundamental objective weighting, ensuring strict compliance with foundational axioms during self-modification.

max_self_evolution_rate.reason: Limits rate of architectural change to prevent runaway instability.

foundational_objective_weight.reason: Ensures primary mission safety objectives always retain dominance in GAX calculation, regardless of S-01 Efficacy metric pressure.
